TITLE: Compressor GIF - melhor compressor GIF - safeimagekit
META: Você está procurando um compressor GIF de alta qualidade? Bem, então você está no lugar certo. Nossa ferramenta de compressão GIF é extremamente segura, fácil de usar e super rápida.

TEXTUAL_CONTENT.content: Nossa ferramenta de compressão de GIF comprime as imagens mantendo sua qualidade.
Nenhum dos seus dados é enviado em nossos servidores, todas as operações são feitas no próprio navegador. Isso nos permite ser 100% seguros para nossos usuários
Nossa ferramenta de compressão de GIF funciona em quase todos os tipos de navegadores e dispositivos.
Nossa ferramenta de compressão de GIF é muito fácil de entender, nenhum profissional é necessário para trabalhar em nossa ferramenta.
Nossa ferramenta de compressão de GIF é totalmente gratuita, você pode usar todas as nossas ferramentas sem pagar um único centavo
Nossa ferramenta de compressão de GIF é totalmente baseada em navegador e nenhum software adicional é necessário para ser baixado no seu dispositivo.

HOW_TO_CONTENT.heading: Como comprimir nosso arquivo GIF.
steps: Faça upload do arquivo GIF ou clique na seta suspensa e selecione Dropbox/Google Drive
Ajuste os parâmetros usando as opções fornecidas.
Ajuste a orientação do arquivo de imagem.
Clique na opção salvar para salvar as alterações feitas.
Baixe o arquivo de imagem usando a opção de download.
Viva!!! a imagem está pronta para balançar.

FAQ.question: Is it safe to allow access to my drive?
FAQ.answer: Yes, it is absolutely safe to allow and give us access to your drive. We won't be making any changes to your site and your dfiles will be safe with you.

FAQ.question: How can I upload files from my drive/dropbox?
FAQ.answer: Click on the drop down arrow and select Dropbox/Google Drive. Select the Google account from where you want to link your drive. Now you can select the files that you want to upload.

FAQ.question: What are the features offered by the “GIF compressor” feature from safeimagekit.com while compressing an image with a GIF image?
FAQ.answer:
GIF compressor feature from safeimagekit.com offers versatile features while compressing a GIF file. The main features include
Modifying the uploaded GIF file by adjusting the dimensions of the image such as height, width, etc. This GIF compression feature also presents the compression by entering size which can be extended to max or min depending on the GIF file uploaded. This feature also provides a strict mode and orientation mode for accurate and rotation adjustment. The GIF compressor also provides the option to adjust the quality of the image and also lets the user convert the format of the image to the user’s advantage.

FAQ.question: What are the parameters provided by the GIF compressor feature from safeimagekit.com, after we upload a GIF file?
FAQ.answer: The compression feature from safeimagekit.com provides various parameters after we upload an image with GIF format, these parameters include the name of the image, size of the image, type of the image, etc. The parameter is the last modified, where it gives us the time, date, and the time zone where it was last modified. This also provides us with a progress bar after uploading and before starting the editing of the image file uploaded.

FAQ.question: What are the adjusting features provided by safeimagekit.com to the GIF files, while compressing a GIF file?
FAQ.answer: The GIF file compression feature from safeimagekit.com provides many features while compressing an image. It lets the user adjust the dimensions of the GIF file by adjusting the measurements such as width and height. The max height and the max-width provide the user with the maximum limit of the photo compression. While the min-width and min-height provide the user with a minimum limit of the photo compression. The convert size option lets the user compress on the whole.

FAQ.question: How does the quality adjustment option of the GIF compressor feature from safeimagekit.com work?
FAQ.answer: The quality adjustment option of the GIF compressor feature from safeimagekit.com is an important feature that lets the user decide the overall quality of the GIF file uploaded. This feature can be accessed from the “Enter the quality” space after uploading the image. This adjusts the sharpness, contrast, blur (on small amounts), and many other image parameters on the whole. The user can decide the measurement from 0.1 to 1 scale. If he doesn’t want any change in the quality of the image uploaded, this option can be skipped.

FAQ.question: How does the “Mime type” option of compressor feature from safeimagekit.com work?
FAQ.answer: The “Mime type” option of the compressor feature from safeimagekit.com lets the user choose the format of the image after compressing it using the compressor tool from safeimagekit.com. Currently, 5 types of image formats are available for the user. The user can change the format of the image based on his/her requirement. These formats include webp, png, GIF, jpg, jpeg, and gif format. If the user wants to keep the format unchanged, the user can opt for the option called “Enter the mime type”. The “Mime type” option can be accessed at the bottom of the page after uploading the image, and save the changes made.

FAQ.question: Can we edit the text present in the GIF file using the compress GIF feature from safeimagekit.com?
FAQ.answer: No, currently the compress GIF feature from safeimagekit.com only offers the features, which enables the user to compress the GIF file, converting the format of the image from GIF format to other, etc. text editing features is not available in safeimagekit.com. But updates to the website will bring all the exciting features soon.

FAQ.question: Can we edit or compress 4k and 8k images using the GIF compressor from safeimagekit.com?
FAQ.answer: No, currently the compressor feature from safeimagekit.com only offers image editing features up to 1080p at its best. However, 4k image compressing and editing options do exist in safeimagekit.com, but 8k image processing is not available and will be included in the coming future as an update to the website.

FAQ.question: How many GIF files can we edit at a single stretch using the GIF compressor feature from safeimagekit.com?
FAQ.answer: Presently, the compressor feature from safeimagekit.com can edit and compress a single GIF file, as this tool demands decent parameters while editing, multiple GIF files editing feature is not included currently, but updates to the website will make this possible in the future.

FAQ.question: Can I use the GIF compressor feature from safeimagekit.com on my Apple iPhone 11?
FAQ.answer: Yes, the GIF compressor feature from safeimagekit.com is a cross-platform based feature, where the user can use this converter tool from operating systems such as Android, iOS, Windows, and Mac OS. It is independent of the operating systems used but only depends on the internet connection and the size of the GIF files which are uploaded to be compressed into others.

FAQ.question: Can I use the GIF compressor feature from safeimagekit.com on my LINUX OS?
FAQ.answer: Yes, the GIF compressor feature from safeimagekit.com is a cross-platform based feature, where the user can use this converter tool from operating systems such as LINUX, Windows, and Mac OS. It is independent of the operating systems used but only depends on the internet connection and the size of the GIF files which are uploaded to be compressed into others.

FAQ.question: Will my uploaded image files corrupt after compressing them using the exquisite options present in the compress GIF feature from safeimagekit.com?
FAQ.answer: No, the compress feature from safeimagekit.com is built with all the latest programs and security features which does not allow the uploaded GIF files to corrupt. So, the uploaded GIF files are completely safe and secured. Also, safeimagekit.com is a server-free website due to which no GIF files are stored here, and are wiped from the memory as soon as the webpage is closed.

FAQ.question: Will my file be saved after I complete working on the  GIF compresssion tool?
FAQ.answer: No, we do not send any of your files to our servers all the operations are done on the browser itself therefore all your files are completely safe.

FAQ.question: Do I have to do any additional signup or pay extra to use the GIF compresssion tool?
FAQ.answer: Absolutely not, our tool is completely online and does not require you to share any of your personal information with us, like email id, passwords etc. Our tool is completely free of cost.

FAQ.question: How do I communicate if I face any issues or if I want to give any suggestions?
FAQ.answer: We gladly take in any issue or suggestions offered by all the users, please contact us through our social media handles for more information. Safeimagekit.com is available on all the leading social media websites such as Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, and LinkedIn, etc.
